display_long_description:
# Spatial Camera
## JOIN OUR DISCORD COMMUNITY🔗
<https://discord.gg/wDVr6SZgUw>
# Experience your memories in a whole new dimension.

With Spatial Camera, you can capture, save, and relive your moments in stunning 3D stereo. Using your Meta Quest, the app records both stereoscopic videos and stereo photos, bringing depth and realism that standard cameras cannot achieve.

## Key Features

* 🎥 **Record in 3D** – Capture videos that feel alive with depth.
* 📸 **Take 3D Photos** – Preserve stills in true stereoscopic form.
* 📂 **Save to Gallery** – Export photos and videos directly to your native gallery.
* ▶️ **Direct Upload to YouTube**  - Upload your 3D videos straight from the app to your YouTube channel.
* ▶️ **YouTube Export (3D Ready)** – Export videos as YouTube-ready stereoscopic **MKV** files. When uploaded to YouTube, they are automatically detected and played as **3D videos**.

* ✂️ **Photo & Video Editing** – Trim captured videos, adjust **brightness**, **contrast**, and **saturation** for both photos and videos, and apply **LUT effects** after capture to achieve the look you want.
[media]
* ✨ **Effects** – Apply real-time visual filters to photos and videos.
[media]

* 🧭 **Level Indicator** – Helps you keep the headset horizontal for better stereo alignment.
[media]

* 📏 **Depth Indicator** – Shows optimal minimal distance for stronger Spatial 3D effect.
[media]
* 📐 **Choose Resolution** – Select photo and video resolution based on your needs.
* 🎚️ **Video Codec & Bitrate Control** – Adjust recording codec & bitrate for quality or file size.

# Spatial Camera
## JOIN OUR DISCORD COMMUNITY🔗
<https://discord.gg/wDVr6SZgUw>
# Experience your memories in a whole new dimension.

With Spatial Camera, you can capture, save, and relive your moments in stunning 3D stereo. Using your Meta Quest, the app records both stereoscopic videos and stereo photos, bringing depth and realism that standard cameras cannot achieve.

## Key Features

* 🎥 **Record in 3D** – Capture videos that feel alive with depth.
* 📸 **Take 3D Photos** – Preserve stills in true stereoscopic form.
* 📂 **Save to Gallery** – Export photos and videos directly to your native gallery.
* ▶️ **Direct Upload to YouTube**  - Upload your 3D videos straight from the app to your YouTube channel.
* ▶️ **YouTube Export (3D Ready)** – Export videos as YouTube-ready stereoscopic **MKV** files. When uploaded to YouTube, they are automatically detected and played as **3D videos**.

* ✂️ **Photo & Video Editing** – Trim captured videos, adjust **brightness**, **contrast**, and **saturation** for both photos and videos, and apply **LUT effects** after capture to achieve the look you want.

* ✨ **Effects** – Apply real-time visual filters to photos and videos.
![{"height":320,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499618937_1177879710392941_5821683160746157823_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=P5oq2ohCe0QQ7kNvwE4UCFy&_nc_oc=Adn8yvLE7xvC9rfUkOUG0cqhO68ewqPqsS1Dd6ie_BgO3D0ue6Fbwkk9ICEeIl9IzRU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=2U8JEUu_Dwxa0PmHjk9XMQ&oh=00_Aft833gQEiVLehz0-jiqlCpbYT7peN3JN0iHRkYrDC2-Gw&oe=699520B9)

* 🧭 **Level Indicator** – Helps you keep the headset horizontal for better stereo alignment.
![{"height":320,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822004_1386090029616457_2103810948309531834_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Ei3giRZ6qnAQ7kNvwFM2f8Y&_nc_oc=AdkUHjI0qgDZaSAl_49_xUCDOOMZyhmvrwbiuNYqaYYNNGbca-kV2w-ssC6Ce8g3i8o&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=2U8JEUu_Dwxa0PmHjk9XMQ&oh=00_AfsuRlbRzXya0cdjtYGkfO5UUQfUocvtWKg0xeaPF_NT2Q&oe=69952DD7)

* 📏 **Depth Indicator** – Shows optimal minimal distance for stronger Spatial 3D effect.
![{"height":320,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499623876_943060232204511_8206056554219011792_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Y9G9f0wdxBoQ7kNvwHRV32S&_nc_oc=AdnsUZ2JDOI-Y97Qw9WQ0UY3eDjz-y8PWsRTtp2hpHdl84wecgmNTuhYXyqxeTRIBos&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=2U8JEUu_Dwxa0PmHjk9XMQ&oh=00_AftCvmys7FvVXykNpfgmdNQpc17Q0XZ3TdPfwG1sxk9rAw&oe=69953BF1)
* 📐 **Choose Resolution** – Select photo and video resolution based on your needs.
* 🎚️ **Video Codec & Bitrate Control** – Adjust recording codec & bitrate for quality or file size.
